languages.text: "Да чтоб заколоть ей кого! Вилка, она ж не ложка, а нож почти! Вот зачем она ему, когда похлебку можно ртом хлебать, а питбрикет — зубами грызть?"

traits.locale_text: "Та чтоб заколоть ей кого! Вилка, она ж не ложка, а нож почти! Вот зачем она ему, когда похлебку можно ртом хлебать, а питбрикет — зубом грызть?"

languages.text: "To stab someone! A fork's not a spoon, it's practically a knife! Why does he need it when he can eat soup with his mouth and chew nutribars with his teeth?"
languages.original_text: "Да чтоб заколоть ей кого! Вилка, она ж не ложка, а нож почти! Вот зачем она ему, когда похлебку можно ртом хлебать, а питбрикет — зубами грызть?"

"To stab someone! A fork's not a spoon, it's practically a knife! Why does he need it when he can eat soup with his mouth and chew nutribars with his teeth?"

languages.text: «¡Para clavárselo a alguien! ¡Un tenedor no es una cuchara, es prácticamente un cuchillo! ¿Para qué otra cosa lo iba a querer, si la sopa se la puede beber y las barritas de nutrientes no hace falta pincharlas?».
languages.original_text: "To stab someone! A fork's not a spoon, it's practically a knife! Why does he need it when he can eat soup with his mouth and chew nutribars with his teeth?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Para clavárselo a alguien! ¡Un tenedor no es una cuchara, es prácticamente un cuchillo! ¿Para qué otra cosa lo iba a querer, si la sopa se la puede beber y las barritas de nutrientes no hace falta pincharlas?».

languages.text: 「誰かを刺すためにさ！フォークはスプーンとは違う。ナイフと同じようなものだ！スープは口で食べて、ナトリバーは歯で噛みちぎればいいのに、なぜフォークなんか必要になるんだ？」
languages.original_text: "To stab someone! A fork's not a spoon, it's practically a knife! Why does he need it when he can eat soup with his mouth and chew nutribars with his teeth?"

traits.locale_text: 「誰かを刺すためにさ！フォークはスプーンとは違う。ナイフと同じようなものだ！スープは口で食べて、ナトリバーは歯で噛みちぎればいいのに、なぜフォークなんか必要になるんだ？」

languages.text: “当然是捅人了！叉子可不是勺子，更像是刀子！他明明可以用嘴喝汤，用牙来嚼营养条，既然如此，他要叉子干什么呢？”
languages.original_text: "To stab someone! A fork's not a spoon, it's practically a knife! Why does he need it when he can eat soup with his mouth and chew nutribars with his teeth?"

traits.locale_text: “当然是捅人了！叉子可不是勺子，更像是刀子！他明明可以用嘴喝汤，用牙来嚼营养条，既然如此，他要叉子干什么呢？”

languages.text: "Jemanden erstechen! Eine Gabel ist kein Löffel, sondern praktisch ein Messer! Wozu braucht er sie, wenn er Suppe mit seinem Mund essen und Nutririegel mit seinen Zähnen kauen kann?"
languages.original_text: "To stab someone! A fork's not a spoon, it's practically a knife! Why does he need it when he can eat soup with his mouth and chew nutribars with his teeth?"

traits.locale_text: "Jemanden erstechen! Eine Gabel ist kein Löffel, sondern praktisch ein Messer! Wozu braucht er sie, wenn er Suppe mit seinem Mund essen und Nutririegel mit seinen Zähnen kauen kann?"

languages.text: « Pour poignarder quelqu'un ! Une fourchette, ça a rien à voir avec une cuillère, c'est presque un couteau ! Pas besoin de couverts pour manger de la soupe et des nutribarres, que je sache, alors forcément, c'est qu'il a autre chose en tête ! »
languages.original_text: "To stab someone! A fork's not a spoon, it's practically a knife! Why does he need it when he can eat soup with his mouth and chew nutribars with his teeth?"

traits.locale_text: « Pour poignarder quelqu'un ! Une fourchette, ça a rien à voir avec une cuillère, c'est presque un couteau ! Pas besoin de couverts pour manger de la soupe et des nutribarres, que je sache, alors forcément, c'est qu'il a autre chose en tête ! »

languages.text: "Birine saplamak için! Çatal dediğin kaşık değil ya, bildiğin bıçak sayılır! Çorbayı ağzıyla içip besinbarları dişleriyle çiğneyebiliyorken ne yapacakmış çatalla?"
languages.original_text: "To stab someone! A fork's not a spoon, it's practically a knife! Why does he need it when he can eat soup with his mouth and chew nutribars with his teeth?"
